pageProduct.name: Waxaway Warm Wax 350g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The first microwaveable warm wax on supermarket shelves over 20
years ago, Waxaway undergoes a specialised cooking process to
ensure an excellent grip and a clean finish without sticky residue.
Its convenient water-soluble formula contains natural Alpha
Hydroxy Acids to revitalise the skin leaving it smooth, soft and
silky.
